title: Knight Collector - Novel Updates
tags: Academy   Aristocracy   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Kingdoms   Knights   Nobles   Sword Wielder   Transmigration
author: boots
description:
From now on, a battle of sponsors aiming to fill the positions of noble knights will begin.

Clash! A knight collector!

…Lauren transmigrated into a nameless game that wasn’t even announced.

Bad ending, gambling ending, escape ending, and knight ending. I saw all the unfortunate endings, yet I never reached the happy ending at all, and I’m still struggling as a player to get it.

‘I’ll get out of here this time!’

So Lauren decides to get out of the game by attacking all five knights…

Strangely, it’s easier to attack them?>
